title: Any PDMP start date
name: AnyPdmpDt
description: Date when PDMP enabling legislation was first enacted for any type of PDMP in effect (including paper-based systems). Source: PDAPS for first PDMP laws passed after January 1, 1998; Info on laws prior to 1998 came from Brandeis TTAC.
source_long: RAND-USC Schaeffer Opioid Policy Tools and Information Center, 2021
